tools.xor-analyzer.title: XOR Analyzer
tools.xor-analyzer.description: XOR encryption analysis and decryption tool
tools.xor-analyzer.keyLengthHint: Hint: Lower Hamming distance indicates higher probability
tools.xor-analyzer.aboutDesc: XOR (exclusive or) is a simple encryption method commonly found in malware and simple data obfuscation. XORing data with the same key twice restores the original data, so encryption and decryption use the same operation.
